amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to transfer $5 million from the Department of Veterans Affairs Health Administration's (VHA) Medical Community Care Account to the Medical Services Account for the explicit use for the Va's Adaptive Sports Grant (ASG) program, equine assisted therapy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Barr.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
